survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Sustainability Initiatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on workplace sustainability initiatives to assess satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with your company's current sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure familiarity levels. Ensure mobile responsiveness for easy selection.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with your company's current sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives are currently available at your workplace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to capture multiple selections. Ensure clear labeling of checkboxes.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives are currently available at your workplace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your company's sustainability efforts?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure balanced options.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your company's sustainability efforts?

questions.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented at your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure a text box is provided.

script.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented at your workplace?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to participate in sustainability programs if more options were available?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure participation likelihood. Ensure clear labeling.

script.question_text: How likely are you to participate in sustainability programs if more options were available?
